landing.hero_description: DBKeep is a free and open-source tool to model your database schemas with an intuitive visual interface.
landing.feature_visual_description: Create tables, columns, and relations with a simple drag-and-drop interface.
landing.feature_export_description: Export your schemas to SQL for PostgreSQL, MySQL, or SQLite.
landing.feature_opensource_description: Free forever. Contribute on GitHub and make it better together.
landing.cta_description: Create a free account and start designing your database schema.

project.name: Project name
project.welcome_message: Start by creating a new project to design your database.
project.no_results_description: No projects match your search criteria.
project.rename_description: Enter a new name for this project.
project.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this project?
project.confirm_delete_description: This action is irreversible. All project data will be lost.
project.empty_list_description: Create your first project to start designing your databases.

table.name: Table name
table.edit_description: Customize the table name, color and columns
table.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this table?

group.title: Group title
group.edit_description: Customize the group name and color
group.name: Group name
group.delete_warning: Tables inside this group will not be deleted, only unassigned.
group.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this group?

note.edit_description: Customize the note title, content and color
note.name: Note title
note.delete_warning: This note will be permanently deleted.
note.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this note?

relation.edit_description: Configure the relation type and referential actions
relation.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this relation?
relation.already_exists_description: A relation between these two columns already exists.

errors.UNAUTHORIZED: You must be logged in to perform this action
errors.FORBIDDEN: You don't have permission to perform this action
errors.AUTH_EMAIL_ALREADY_EXISTS: This email address is already in use
errors.AUTH_SESSION_EXPIRED: Your session has expired, please log in again
errors.PROJECT_PERMISSION_DENIED: You don't have access to this project

confirm.delete_tables: Are you sure you want to delete {count} tables?
confirm.delete_groups: Are you sure you want to delete {count} groups?
confirm.delete_notes: Are you sure you want to delete {count} notes?
confirm.delete_relations: Are you sure you want to delete {count} relations?
confirm.delete_elements: Are you sure you want to delete {count} elements?

auth.login_subtitle: Welcome back! Sign in to continue.
auth.register_subtitle: Join DBKeep and start designing your databases.
auth.name: Name
auth.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
auth.password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
auth.name_min_length: Name must be at least 2 characters
auth.error_login: Unable to sign in. Please check your credentials.
auth.error_register: Unable to create account. Please try again.
auth.error_logout: Unable to sign out. Please try again.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your preferences and application settings.
settings.about_description: An open-source tool to design your databases visually.

sql.apply_or_cancel: You have modified the SQL manually. Apply changes to update the schema or cancel to restore the generated SQL.
sql.fix_errors_to_apply: Fix the errors in your SQL before applying changes.
sql.readonly_message: You are in read-only mode. You cannot edit this content.

export.title: Export schema
export.description: Choose the export format for your database schema.
export.format_sql_description: Executable SQL script with all CREATE TABLE statements
export.format_json_description: Structured format with all project metadata
export.format_pdf_description: Printable documentation with visual schema preview
export.format_image_description: Canvas capture in high resolution image format

guest.mode_description: You are using DBKeep in guest mode. Your projects are saved locally.
guest.no_account_features: Some features (profile, settings) are not available in guest mode.

register_disabled.title: Registration disabled
register_disabled.description: New account registration is currently disabled on this instance.
